name: reenio
author: reenio

sections.description:
System reenio is an on-line reservation system and represents one of the most effective ways to make reservations and stay in contact with your customers.

Using this plugin, you can embed reservation system anywhere into your web site. Just enter your specific reenio identification key and set the parameters.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the ‘reenio’ menu to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is it possible to use this plugin without registering for reenio system?

No, the plugin serves as a preview and embedding of the reservation system into the web, it is necessary to be a user of this system.
sections.changelog:

  • Test compatibility with 6.6 core.

  • Type translated.

1.4

  • Plugin name correction.

1.3

  • User can change language of reservation form.
  • Better selection of shortcode type.
  • Shortcode generator updated.
  • Shortcode atributes in english.
  • Readme in english, language fixes.
  • Escaping strings.
  • Language files updated.

1.2

  • Minor corrections.

1.1

  • First letter in lowercase, small text corrections.
  • Language files for translations.
  • Czech and English translations.

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Plug-in for embedding of reservation system reenio into the web presentation.
